::Spears::

She looked deep into Prebon's eyes.  She leaned forward and kissed 
him. "Master. I wish to say good bye to my old comrad. While I still 
can. I don't know why, but I feel like I should say good bye to him. 
Sure he won't know me later on. I hope you can understand." She 
hugged him and held him close. "If you do not wish me to do so, I 
will understand, my master."
